pages.text: The Imperfect Ritual Stone is a reusable ritual activation block. Unlike the Master Ritual Stone from Blood Magic, these rituals have no persistent effect or upkeep cost.$(br2)Place a specific block on top of the stone and right-click to activate the corresponding ritual.$(br2)Each ritual activation consumes LP from your soul network, but the stone remains for future use.
